verses.verse: וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about ע֚וֹד <WH5750> again לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go אֱ‍ֽהַב־ <WH157> yet love אִשָּׁ֔ה <WH802> a woman אֲהֻ֥בַת <WH157> beloved רֵ֖עַ <WH7453> of [her] friend וּמְנָאָ֑פֶת <WH5003> yet an adulteress כְּאַהֲבַ֤ת <WH160> according to the love יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> toward the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וְהֵ֗ם <WH1992> they פֹּנִים֙ <WH6437> who look אֶל־ <WH413> about אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <WH312> to other וְאֹהֲבֵ֖י <WH157> and love אֲשִׁישֵׁ֥י <WH809> flagons עֲנָבִֽים׃ <WH6025> of wine

וָאֶכְּרֶ֣הָ <WH3739> So I bought לִּ֔י בַּחֲמִשָּׁ֥ה <WH2568> fif עָשָׂ֖ר <WH6240> teen כָּ֑סֶף <WH3701> [pieces] of silver וְחֹ֥מֶר <WH2563> and [for] an homer שְׂעֹרִ֖ים <WH8184> of barley וְלֵ֥תֶךְ <WH3963> and an half homer שְׂעֹרִֽים׃ <WH8184> of barley

וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> And I said אֵלֶ֗יהָ <WH413> be toward יָמִ֤ים <WH3117> days רַבִּים֙ <WH7227> for me many תֵּ֣שְׁבִי <WH3427> unto her Thou shalt abide לִ֔י לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תִזְנִ֔י <WH2181> thou shalt not play the harlot וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> nor תִֽהְיִ֖י <WH1961> and thou shalt not be לְאִ֑ישׁ <WH376> for [another] man וְגַם־ <WH1571> will also אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I אֵלָֽיִךְ׃ <WH413> be toward

כִּ֣י ׀ <WH3588> for יָמִ֣ים <WH3117> days רַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> many יֵֽשְׁבוּ֙ <WH3427> shall abide בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> For the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֵ֥ין <WH369> without מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> without a king וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> without שָׂ֔ר <WH8269> and without a prince וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> and without זֶ֖בַח <WH2077> and without a sacrifice וְאֵ֣ין <WH369> without מַצֵּבָ֑ה <WH4676> and without an image וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> without אֵפ֖וֹד <WH646> and without an ephod וּתְרָפִֽים׃ <WH8655> and [without] teraphim

אַחַ֗ר <WH310> Afterward יָשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> return בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> shall the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel וּבִקְשׁוּ֙ <WH1245> and seek אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֣ה <WH3069> God אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> their God וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> דָּוִ֣ד <WH1732> and David מַלְכָּ֑ם <WH4428> their king וּפָחֲד֧וּ <WH6342> and shall fear אֶל־ <WH413> about יְהוָ֛ה <WH3069> God וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to טוּב֖וֹ <WH2898> and his goodness בְּאַחֲרִ֥ית <WH319> in the latter הַיָּמִֽים׃ <WH3117> days פ
